SOAPdenovo-Trans
================

# Available modules


The overview below shows which SOAPdenovo-Trans installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using SOAPdenovo-Trans, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load SOAPdenovo-Trans/1.0.5-GCC-12.3.0
```
